mapper.select: SELECT '0000' AS RESULTCODE , #{year} AS YEAR , #{month} AS MONTH , COUNT(DISTINCT USERID) AS TOTALCNT FROM REQUESTINFO WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%m') = #{month}
SELECT '0000' AS RESULTCODE , CAST(AVG(CNT) AS SIGNED) AS TOTALCNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(REQUESTID) AS CNT FROM REQUESTINFO WHERE REQUESTCODE = 'L' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y%m%d') ) AS TMP
SELECT '0000' AS RESULTCODE , COUNT(REQUESTID) AS TOTALCNT FROM REQUESTINFO WHERE REQUESTCODE = 'L' AND DAYOFWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y%m%d')) BETWEEN 2 AND 6

SELECT '0000' AS RESULTCODE , COUNT(REQUESTID) AS TOTALCNT , #{dept} AS DEPARTMENT , #{year} AS YEAR , #{month} AS MONTH FROM REQUESTINFO, USER WHERE REQUESTINFO.USERID = USER.USERID AND REQUESTCODE = 'L' AND HR_ORGAN = #{dept} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%m') = #{month}
